Anyone who says this is just Hollywood American propaganda is full of shit.  This movie shows EXACTLY what it is like to serve in the US Armed Forces.  It's an awesome experience.  Even people who have their legs blown off are still heroes who get medals and lots of pussy for the rest of their lives!

Okay, now that I've defended America, I'll comment on the video quality.

Pretty amazing for a cam.  Probably the best cam I've ever seen.  I don't usually watch cams, but I was fine with this one the whole way through.  It's like a mediocre dvd rip.  A couple of times the audio is out out of sync.  A couple of times it stutters.  Not a big deal.  Only one scene was too dark for me to see what was going on for about 1 second.  Not important.

For a dvd rip I would give this an 8.5/8.5
For a cam I would give it a 10/10

Definitely watchable on a laptop.  Most of the time you will forget it's a cam...
